abstract.text: Exchange request information that participants send in a turn-based match.

inlineContent.text: protocol methods when the local player receives an exchange request or recipients reply to an exchange request. The exchange object encapsulates your custom game data that you want to communicate to other players.

method. Then GameKit sends the request to the recipients passing the exchange object to the
protocol method. GameKit sets the status of the exchange object to
After all recipients respond to the request, using the

and then passes it to the

protocol method when all recipients reply to specific exchange requests.

abstract.text: A Boolean value indicating whether GameKit can add badges to a turn-based game icon.
Enable players to interact with friends, compare leaderboard ranks, earn achievements, and participate in multiplayer games.
The protocol that handles turn-based and data-exchange events between participants in a match.
Handles when the sender cancels an exchange request they intiated.
Handles when all recipients of an exchange request respond.
Handles when the local player receives an exchange request from another participant.
Exchange request information that participants send in a turn-based match.
Cancels an exchange request.
The date when all recipients of the exchange request reply.
The game-specific exchange data that GameKit sends to participants.
The identifier for the exchange request.
A localized message from the sender to the recipients of an exchange request.
The participants who receives the exchange request.
The replies from recipients of the exchange request.
Replies to an exchange request on behalf of a recipient.
The date that the sender initiates the exchange request.
The participant who sends the exchange request to recipients.
The status of the exchange request.
The date that the recipients must reply by before the exchange request times out.
Details about a recipient’s response to an exchange request.
The status of an exchange or reply.
GameKit sent the exchange request to recipients but not all recipients replied.
All recipients of the exchange request replied.
An object that encapsulates the match data for games where players take turns.
The exchange requests that all recipients replied to and the current participant needs to save.
Saves match data for completed exchanges without ending the turn.
Sends an exchange request that contains your game data to one or more participants.
An interface that allows a player to invite other players to a turn-based match and automatch to fill any empty slots.
A participant in a turn-based match.
Develop games where multiple players take turns and can exchange data while waiting for their turn.
Add the ability for players to exchange game data and send messages while waiting for their turns.

abstract.text: Notify players of match events by sending messages and game data.

abstract.text: Let Game Center store and forward match data between players in a turn-based game.

abstract.text: The root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies, from which subclasses inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
